event_title: Three Girls in a Line on the Beach

interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " Behind a Bathroom, Under the Blazing Sun " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " What's Done is Done " .

progression.synopsis: Rin and Futaba attempt to become more friendly with Yumi and she, of course, shuts them down in an over the top manner.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.8.
